data.title: Great place!!
data.text: The atmosphere is wonderful! The service is great, professional, and quick! The food is also great as well! Looking for a nice place to relax, have some good food, or a drink after work, or a fun place to go on the weekend, come here!!

data.title: Good Salad
data.text: My experience was at least average. The food was pretty good but nothing super special. My service experience was mediocre. I think that I hit in between shifts... Worth a stop at least for a beer.

data.title: Interesting, eclectic menu....good drinks
data.text: We enjoy this place because it is a low key, neighborhood establishment with a varied menu. You'll find the usual fare but with a twist...we had baked Brie with fruit & they didn't scrimp on anything...the burgers are good plus they have substantial entrees. Clam chowder & chili were excellent although they could have been bit warmer, serving people are ok, they sometimes ignore those who aren't their regular customers....enjoy!

data.title: Great Place to Catch Up with Friends!
data.text: This is a local bar that we will typically go to to catch up with friends.  Small, but quaint inside and there is an outdoor area to sit.  Too bad we don't have more of these types of establishments in our downtown, historical area.

data.title: Great salads and sandwiches
data.text:
Don't know why we took so long to eat at this nice little restaurant but we finally did and it was a great  experience. This was lunch time so my wife and I both had a salad and split a sandwich which was plenty big enough for two people. Within minutes of our arrival the place filled to capacity and we were concerned about slower service due to the fact there was one server and one cook. Our concerns quickly diminished as we watched Britney the server and Manny the chef perform unlike any other restaurant team we have ever seen. The food was good the service was prompt we shall return. This is a nice place for families.

H & K
Upland, Ca.

data.title: Good food bad service
data.text: Have been to JD's only twice, both times we enjoyed the atmosphere and the food was pretty good for a bar & grill. But the service was not good. We had too wait a long time (both) times to place our order and the food took quite a while to come out. I guess it's a good thing when a restaurant is crowded but I suspect poor management is the culprit here; it appears the servers may get overwhelmed when they have big crowds. Too many other good places to eat locally so I won't be going back to JD's anytime soon.

data.title: Always consistent.....
data.text: We've been to Upland's JD Allison's restaurant a number of times and should have written this review long ago. If you want consistent good food and drink with a nice atmosphere in Upland, this is one of the places to go. Unfortunately we don't live close enough to go on a regular basis but always stop in after getting some tattoo work done at Six Feet Under Tattoo Parlor just down the street. The beer is always nice and cold, served in a cold glass and the food is great. You have to try the Orange Calamari. It is different but delicious and if I am correct they use some orange marmalade in the sauce which makes it very tasty. You can't go wrong with the Gorgonzola fries or the Ultimate Wedge salad. Their Patty Melt is great and don't forget to try the fried bologna sandwich. Just like the ones we used to make when we were kids, only we can drink a beer with it now. There's so much more on the menu that we haven't tried yet, but we'll get to it. We just heard they are opening a "sister" restaurant across the street that honors our troops and will be a deli style place with a bar, some TV's and a deli case in the back. We'll be sure to try it out when it opens.

data.title: You have to try it!
data.text:
This complete menu always  has me coming back for more! The portions that are served are beyond fulfilling!They also give you choices of 4 types of breads for any of their sandwiches...but you can never go wrong with their Signature salads... "Allison's Rutherford" along side with Champagne vinergarete(Chicken&potatoes sautéed)One of my absolute favorites...i can ramble for days about how amazing the Beef dip is but the point is...if you haven't been...CHECK IT OUT! The food is hands down unique,fresh & generously portioned!

Oh and can't forget about that 5$steak thursdays!!

data.title: Great bar and grill!
data.text: Was searching for a nice local sports bar and grill and landed on this place. It was awesome and a great choice! Good atmosphere with great food and good looking waitresses which is always a plus. Would definitely go back and Thursday is $5 steak night!

data.title: A Downtown Upland Asset
data.text:
Great California cuisine in a nice, dark setting.

You're sorta in the bar with the TV's.   Probably not a place for a quiet, elegant dinner.  Good, though, for feeling the beat.

Great salads.

data.title: Very Good Food, Friendly Service
data.text: We were looking for a place to eat while visiting this area, so we turned to TripAdvisor. JD Allison's Bar and Grill was highly recommended so we gave them a try. They are located in historic Upland CA, very nice location! The staff was very friendly, the service was fast, and the food was very good. The only drawback is the small seating area, arriving early is recommended.

data.title: Good food
data.text: This is a bar and grill.  We sat near the bar tho not by request.  It was OK and we had daylight from windows and could see outdoors.  For the most part it was not too noisy.  As it got near 6PM, the crowd grew and it was a bit noisier.  Perfect for a B & G scene.  This was a Friday night so we expected noise.  We were going to a play near by so by the time there was some 'bar' noise, we were leaving.  Service was pretty good.  For some reason, the steak ordered by one of us took forever to arrive.  Salads, soup and chicken came but the steak took almost 10 minutes longer.  All food we ordered was great.  The animal fies were fabulous.  Portions were fine and the teriyaki chicken/steak came with veggies and salad.  No potato or bread!  Yay, carb friendly!  Good menu - not so big that it took an hour to read.  Nice variety to select from.  Several items seemed like 'signature' dishes.. will go back to try some other items.

data.title: perfect
data.text: Grabbed a bite to eat while in town.  Great pub with a wide selection of meals, entrees, sides, and salads.  Husband and I are both salad snobs, and were super excited on the variety of healthy choices!  All ingredients fresh with plump juicy chicken, and fast service. Appropriately busy for a Thursday dinner.  Check the specials, I think it was $5 steak night.

data.title: What a great place!
data.text: JD's is a local bar in downtown Upland. Great Food, Great drinks, and the staff always makes us feel unhurried and more than welcome. One of our favorite places to spend an evening with friends.

data.title: The best bar food ever!
data.text: Nice place, good atmosphere , the food in great. the the stuffed chillis are awsome, the burgers are good too.a variety of food choices   great selection of beers.
